text: thuma atm khalq al'iinsan wabdeh, wa'ahsan khlqth, wanafakh fih min ruwhih bi'iirsal almalik lh; lynfkh fih alrwh, wajaeal lakum -ayha alnas- niemat alsame wal'absar yumyaz biha bayn al'aswat walalwan waldhwat walashkhas, wanaemat aleaql yumyaz biha bayn alkhayr walshr walnafe waldar. qalilana maa tashkurun rabukum ealaa ma 'aneam bih elykm
